pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface Between the 'FSK-ML' Standard and 'R' // Functions for importing, creating, editing and exporting 'FSK' files https://foodrisklabs.bfr.bund.de/fsk-ml-food-safety-knowledge- markup-language/ using the 'R' programming environment. Furthermore, it enables users to run simulations contained in the 'FSK' files and visualize the results.
